appName: Desert Ambush VR: Hold the Line!
displayName: Desert Ambush VR: Hold the Line!
display_name: Desert Ambush VR: Hold the Line!
display_long_description:
⚔️ Lead the Army! Defend the Princess! Conquer the Desert!

Step into the chaos of desert warfare as the Prince of Wallachia, tasked with protecting an Ottoman princess and leading your army against an unstoppable enemy horde.

Fight! Survive! Hold the Line!

Story Mode – Epic 10-Battle Campaign
Join your army in 10 massive battles across breathtaking desert maps—from ancient ruins and rocky valleys to marketplaces and fortified camps. Each map is a strategic playground, filled with traps, destructible structures, and brutal close-quarters combat. Rally your warriors, set defenses, and face the enemy king in a final climactic showdown.

Score Mode – Endless Wave Survival
Test your skill in Score Mode: choose difficulty, survive relentless enemy waves, and climb the global leaderboards.

Key Features 🗡️ Brutal VR Combat – Master swords, rapiers, shields, polearms, war hammers, throwing bombs, iron balls, and early gunpowder weapons like flintlock pistols and shotguns.

🏛️ Destructible Environments – Crush enemies by collapsing columns, triggering rockslides, or throwing debris and barrels.

🔥 Dynamic, Physics-Based Battles – Every weapon and object behaves realistically. Use the environment to survive.

🎯 Tactical Resource System – Summon reinforcements, use healing, and unlock new weapons mid-battle.

🏆 Will you hold the line—or be buried beneath the sands of war?
